RelatedSentence: At a recent workshop hosted by the luxury shopping center at the Sea View Hotel , Marc Perlowitz of Barneys New York said his company is possibly interested in adding its store to the Bal Harbour Shops .

At a recent workshop hosted by the luxury shopping center at the Sea View Hotel , Marc Perlowitz of Barneys New York said his company is possibly interested in adding its store to the Bal Harbour Shops .

Currently , the Bal Harbour Shops is planning to expand the mall to 350,000 square feet of retail space , including 250,000 square feet of additional or expanded specialty department store space , and at least 20 specialty retail boutiques , along with a luxury theater , a multi-purpose community plaza along Collins Avenue and multiple locations for public green space .

Currently , the Bal Harbour Shops is planning to expand the mall to 350,000 square feet of retail space , including 250,000 square feet of additional or expanded specialty department store space , and at least 20 specialty retail boutiques , along with a luxury theater , a multi-purpose community plaza along Collins Avenue and multiple locations for public green space .
At the same time , Bal Harbour Shops would build a new , 60,799 square-foot church for its neighbor , the Church by the Sea , set to be located behind village hall .
However , the village council would need to approve the expansion .
